src_original: āvāse varṣā vaseyaṃ syān me atonidānaṃ jīvitāntarāyaḥ śrāmaṇyāntarāyaḥ brahmacaryāntarāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 」彼比丘自念： 「我在此安居，必為淨行作留難。

src_original: rama ārya. ahaṃ te upasthāsyāmi. dāsīṃ te karmakarīṃ te dāsyāmi. ahaṃ ced asminn  āvāse varṣā vaseyaṃ syān me atonidānaṃ jīvitāntarāyaḥ śrāmaṇyāntarāyo brahmacaryāntarāyaḥ.  yanv aham asmād āvāsāt prakrāmeyaṃ. sa tasmād āvāsāt prakramaty. etad eva pratyayaṃ  kṛtvā anāpattir varṣācchede //
Var-v § 2.1.7 yathāpi tad varṣopagatena bhikṣuṇā anyatmānyatamaṃ śiśum udāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittam udgṛhītaṃ bhavati
tgt_original: 」爾時有比丘，在住處安居。 時有婬女來誘調比丘：

src_original: tatra varṣopagatasya bhikṣor evaṃ bhavaty. aham asminn āvāse varṣā upagataḥ. mayā  cānyatmānyatamaṃ śiśum udāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittam
tgt_original: 「汝可休道，我當為汝作婦，或嫁女與汝。 」彼比丘自念：

src_original: udgṛhītaṃ. ahaṃ ced asminn āvāse varṣā vaseyaṃ syān me atonidānaṃ jīvitāntarāyaḥ
tgt_original: 「我在此安居，必為淨行作留難。
